verbose_text: It has been demonstrated that in ALI, activated PAR2 in the alveolar epithelium increases the expression of NF-kappaB through the PI3K / PKB signaling pathway, causing the release of inflammatory factors, such as PGE2 and COX-2, leading to alveolar epithelial injury; thus, the downregulation of the PI3K / PKB signal pathway can reduce alveolar injury.
evidence: PKB signal pathway can reduce alveolar injury
